name: Create an account with invalid data

testSteps.description: Create an account with invalid data #1: {email=email, password=Abcdefg0, verificationPassword=Abcdefg0, error=The email is invalid}

exception.message:
Expected: "The email is invalid"
     but: was "Internal Server Error"

stackTrace.methodName: theSystemShouldRetrieve
the system should retrieve "The email is invalid"

children.description: Given Estefania has the following data "email", "Abcdefg0" and "Abcdefg0"
When she sends a request to the registration service
POST http://54.226.98.250:9090/auth/register

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Thu, 17 May 2018 22:01:26 GMT
Connection: close
restQuery.responseBody:
{
    "timestamp": "2018-05-17T22:01:26.705+0000",
    "status": 500,
    "error": "Internal Server Error",
    "message": "query did not return a unique result: 7; nested exception is javax.persistence.NonUniqueResultException: query did not return a unique result: 7",
    "path": "/auth/register"
}

children.description: Then the system should retrieve "The email is invalid"

exception.message:
Expected: "The email is invalid"
     but: was "Internal Server Error"

stackTrace.methodName: theSystemShouldRetrieve
the system should retrieve "The email is invalid"

children.description: And status code "400"

userStory.narrative:
As an anonymous user
  I want TO get registered
  So that I can have a profile and interact with the page
